## Quarto

```{r}
#| label: light_theme
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
mtcars |>
  select(cyl, mpg) |>
ggplot(aes(cyl, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_continuous(minor_breaks = scales::breaks_width(0.2)) +
  scale_y_continuous(minor_breaks = scales::breaks_width(1)) +
  guides(x = guide_axis(minor.ticks = TRUE),
         y = guide_axis(minor.ticks = TRUE)) +
  sdtools::theme_sd() +
  theme(plot.background  = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "#D6BFA0", color = NA),
        panel.background = ggplot2::element_rect(fill = "#f3ece3", color = NA),
        axis.title = element_text(color ="#252424"),
        axis.text = element_text(color ="#252424"),
        axis.ticks = element_line(color ="#252424"))
```
